Author: chloesmiddlefinger
Text: Eating disorders thrive on secrecy, guilt, and shame. Now might be the time to open up to your family; if — or rather, *when* — shit inevitably hits the fan, they will catch on eventually. Please try to nip your ED in the bud before it gets out of hand. The road to recovery is rarely linear, and there will always be bumps and uncertainty.   You can do this. I have faith in you.
